entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 04:00 AM PDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with wet snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016
